mapper.select: SELECT d.lprod_gu, d.prod_name, d.prod_insdate, d.prod_cost, d.prod_price, d.prod_mileage,d.prod_buyer,d.lprod_nm FROM buyer c join (SELECT a.prod_buyer, b.lprod_gu,a.prod_name, a.prod_insdate, a.prod_cost, a.prod_price, a.prod_mileage, b.lprod_nm FROM prod a join lprod b on (a.prod_lgu = b.lprod_gu)) d on (d.prod_buyer=c.buyer_id)
